text: Move the compliance fix(es) into their own method and guard with an environment variable. Since they are currently fairly tame we can leave them on per default and use the env var to disable fixing, e.g. `OAUTHLIB_DISABLE_COMPLIANCE_FIXES`.
title: Isolate automatic compliance fixes

text: An alternative spelling is "Isolate fixes for non-standard implementation (e.g. Facebook)" and `OAUTHLIB_DISABLE_NONSTANDARD_FIXES`.
